attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, home sellers are forced to have a Home Information Pack. I believe this to be wrong. It is one of many examples about freedom of choice. If the HIP system is of any use then it will sustain itself without compulsion.

Buyers can always walk away from a house purchase if they expect a HIP and there isn't one. They might also rely on their own judgment or commission surveys - its all about choice.
